categories: Category:Grand Army of the Republic units

nodes.text: A unit within the Grand Army of the Republic was active during the Clone Wars between the Galactic Republic and the Separatist Alliance. At one point during the war, Separatist forces attacked a valley of inhabitants that included Taya and Tam, but were encountered by Jedi Commander Leh'ahnyo Vas and clone trooper Drak. After neutralizing the battle droids nearby, Vas checked on the two while Drak provided fire and waited for the unit's clone medics.

At that time, a squadron of LAAT/i gunships arrived from over the nearby mountain pass and Leh'ahnyo Vas' master leapt into a sea of battle droids. At least one member, Drak, was equipped with white clone trooper armor with bold red lines on his helmet and used a heavy blaster rifle.
The unit of Leh'ahnyo Vas was mentioned in Rise of the Separatists, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
